profit.

* Playing every day to get the first win bonus is definitely going to help you get there a bit quicker. 
* If you aren't willing to spend the money to get him via RP or even an IP boost, your best bet is to wait it out. 
* Playing in a 5man premade team gives you a little bit of bonus IP, which actually stacks up quite quickly. 
* If you are incredibly lucky, you may even get him in a hextech chest :D

Good luck summoner, I hope you get your Braum soon ♥
